name: Diner Out
storyline: Bring your family business back to its glory days in this cozy, comforting merge puzzle game. Cook up a winning menu for old friends and new customers as Emmy, a young chef who's come home from the bustling city to revive her grandpa's small-town diner. Relax with simple, satisfying matching gameplay that you can easily pick up in the time it takes to make a perfect pancake.
summary: Merge matching kitchen ingredients to cook delicious dishes and keep hungry customers happy in this cozy game. Turn your café into the talk of the town!
